title: Ten Reasons Not To Die
description: “Give me ten days, and I can give you ten reasons not to die.” Evan paused. “And if I can’t change your mind by then, you can go jump off that cliff." If it weren't for Evan Woods, Remy Montgomery would've been found dead at the bottom of the Hudson River, crushed by rocks from suicide.From Wattpad.
author: RiceLover
